strengths: The authors have been very responsive to the review feedback and have significantly improved the clarity and comprehensiveness of the article. The addition of a concrete example illustrating perplexity calculation is particularly helpful, making the concept accessible to a wider audience. The expanded discussion on limitations and future research directions further strengthens the article's contribution to the field.
summary: This article provides a thorough and accessible overview of perplexity as a measure of language model proficiency. It effectively explains the concept, calculation, significance, limitations, and future directions of perplexity research. The authors have addressed all previous feedback, resulting in a well-written and informative article.
